messages.message:
:github-fire: +:jenkins_devil: = :train3: hi, I am sure many of you have suffered from the github status check from jenkins not working in the past few weeks, while we are still investigating this issue on preprod jenkins, today we have a workaround for you to improve the status report of the PR runs, starting now on all new PRs you will be able to see an additional github check (named `Instabase - CI` in your PR looks like the screen shot, it is explicitly posted from our pipeline (as opposed to jenkins default) and based on our test, is not affected by the same issue, we made the `switch to use the new check and disable the default one`, *you may need to rebase your PRs* to get this new check showing in your PR, if it was created before we enable it

a few more benefits for this check (in the `details` link of that check)
• we try to parse the output and bring the useful part to show in github (this is an on going effort)
• you will be able to rerun it (if it failed) from github without going to jenkins
feel free to let us know if you have any questions in <#C035SLYCJ9X|>
the changes are backported and we are officially switched to the new github check on all PRs
